channel.title: Putting server on mysql
channel.description:
i have a webby ( www.the-gmrz.com ) it has mysql , phpmyadmin and control panel and stuff.
i want to know how to put my server into mysql, if anyone can help me getting this onto my website then my server will be 24/7 no lag and who ever helps can be an admin. thx
